description: This file defines the main React application component for 'Fruit Ninja Online'. It manages theme toggling, screen navigation between different game screens (home, solo, multiplayer, results, leaderboard, profile), and performs a health check via a stub API call. It imports multiple components representing different screens and manages their display based on user interactions.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages application state, theme, screen navigation, and side effects such as theme updates and health checks.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleGoHome
methods.description: Resets the screen to the home view.

methods.name: handleStartSolo
methods.description: Starts a new solo game, resetting results and changing the screen.

methods.name: handleGameOver
methods.description: Handles game over event by setting results and navigating to the results screen.
